title: Plat 3 ADC, looking for team

embed.description: Shiney / Platinum 3 96LP / 40W 27L Win Ratio 60% / Caitlyn - 9W 5L Win Ratio 64%, Ezreal - 7W 7L Win Ratio 50%, Nami - 9W 1L Win Ratio 90%, Xayah - 9W 1L Win Ratio 90%, Jhin - 4W 3L Win Ratio 57%

body:
I've been on break for a bit, but now i'm back to get stuck into the competitive grind. I can get online everyday if needed. I can play any ADC the team needs me to at a strong level, great understanding of botlane and it's match-ups. Can help assist with the support into a well rounded bot lane if consistency is an issue.

-Working Mic
-Reliable internet 
-Easy to work with, laid-back personality.
-Self driven to be better than the opponents botlane, by far.

Shiney - A Marksman (Feel free to op.gg them)

If you think I'm a right fit for the team, add me ingame: Shiney
or on discord: Shiney#8762

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

replies.body: One of the best teammates you could have
What time are you normally on?
